summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6367 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 60, H. W. Treat's 1st Addition to the City of Ballard, being the alley between Northwest Market Street and Northwest 56th Street from 28th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest and a certain other alley; by paving and otherwise improving the same.
